original: Collin, Erik, direktör, Göteborg, f. 6/4/89 i Gbg av grosshandl. Emil C. o. Elvira Stender. G. 15 m. Ragna Kylberg. Barn: Irene Elinor Margaret f. 15, Jo’han Emil William 19. — Stud:ex. 09, språk- o. yrkesstud. i Engl, Tyskl. o. USA 10-13. Verkst. dir. i Lindahl & Collin, assurans- o. haveribyrå. Styr :iled. i A-B Gbgs Bank, Rederi A-B Transatlantic, A-B Bililingsfors-Långed m. fl. boil., ’led. av hand:- o. sjöfartsnd i Gbg.
translated: Collin, Erik, director, Gothenburg, born on April 6, 1889 in Gothenburg to merchant Emil C. and Elvira Stender. Married for 15 years to Ragna Kylberg. Children: Irene Elinor Margaret born in 1915, Jo’han Emil William born in 1919. He completed his high-school diploma in 1909, studied languages and professions in England, Germany, and the USA from 1910-1913. He became a managing director in Lindahl & Collin, an insurance and marine survey firm. He serves as a board member of A-B Gothenburg Bank, Rederi A-B Transatlantic, A-B Bililingsfors-Långed, and other companies. He is a member of the commerce and shipping associations in Gothenburg.
